verses.verse: וַיִּבְרַ֣ח <S%H1272><s%> fled דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David [מִנֹּוִות כ] (מִנָּיֹ֖ות <S%H5121><s%> Naioth ק) בָּרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> in Ramah וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> and came וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and said לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan מֶ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6213><s%> What have I done מֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What עֲוֹנִ֤י <S%H5771><s%> fault וּמֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What חַטָּאתִי֙ <S%H2403><s%> is my sin לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> that he seeketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> He

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ל֣וֹ חָלִילָה֮ <S%H2486><s%> unto him God forbid לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without תָמוּת֒ <S%H4191><s%> thou shalt not die הִנֵּ֡ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold [לֹו־ עשה כ] (לֹֽא־ יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> accomplish ק) אָבִ֜י <S%H1><s%> behold my father דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing גָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> either great א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing קָטֹ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> or small וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִגְלֶ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> disclosing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנִ֑י <S%H241><s%> So וּמַדּוּעַ֩ <S%H4069><s%> why יַסְתִּ֨יר <S%H5641><s%> hide אָבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> it me and why should my father מִמֶּ֛נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> sware ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> moreover and said יָדֹ֨עַ <S%H3045><s%> certainly יָדַ֜ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> that I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he saith אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֵֽדַע־ <S%H3045><s%> know זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> let יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> Let not Jonathan פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יֵֽעָצֵ֑ב <S%H6087><s%> this lest he be grieved וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> but truly חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [as] the LORD וְחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> is hardly כְפֶ֔שַׂע <S%H6587><s%> [there is] but a step בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> between me and death

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Whatever תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> desireth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> Whatsoever thy soul וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I will even do לָּֽךְ׃ פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3083><s%> unto Jonathan הִֽנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> [is] the new moon מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> Behold to morrow וְאָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> and I יָשֹׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> and I should not fail אֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> to sit עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <S%H398><s%> at meat וְשִׁלַּחְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H7971><s%> but let me go וְנִסְתַּרְתִּ֣י <S%H5641><s%> that I may hide בַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> myself in the field עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> [day] at even הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁית׃ <S%H7992><s%> unto the third

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If פָּקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> at all יִפְקְדֵ֖נִי <S%H6485><s%> miss אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> If thy father וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> me then say נִשְׁאֹל֩ <S%H7592><s%> earnestly נִשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> asked מִמֶּ֤נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David לָרוּץ֙ <S%H7323><s%> [leave] of me that he might run בֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> to Bethlehem עִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> his city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because זֶ֧בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice הַיָּמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> for [there is] a yearly שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַמִּשְׁפָּחָֽה׃ <S%H4940><s%> there for all the family

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> he יֹאמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> If he say ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thus [It is] well שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> shall have peace לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if חָרֹ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> but if he be very יֶֽחֱרֶה֙ <S%H2734><s%> wroth ל֔וֹ דַּ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> [then] be sure כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלְתָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> is determined הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> that evil מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> Therefore

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Therefore thou shalt deal חֶ֙סֶד֙ <S%H2617><s%> kindly עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servant כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> into בִּבְרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> into a covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵבֵ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> for thou hast brought אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> But וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> with thee notwithstanding if there be בִּ֤י עָוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> in me iniquity הֲמִיתֵ֣נִי <S%H4191><s%> slay אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> yourself וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> fathers לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> why זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> then תְבִיאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H935><s%> me thyself for why shouldest thou bring פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> Far be it from thee לָּ֑ךְ כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יָדֹ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> for if I knew אֵדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> certainly כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלְתָ֨ה <S%H3615><s%> were determined הָרָעָ֜ה <S%H7451><s%> that evil מֵעִ֤ם <S%H5973><s%> by אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> by my father לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> upon thee then would not I tell לָֽךְ׃ ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> to Jonathan מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> Who shall tell לִ֑י א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> and מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long יַּעַנְךָ֥ <S%H6030><s%> answer אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> me? or what [if] thy father קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> churlish ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David לְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> and let us go out הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> into the field וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> And they went out שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> both הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of them into the field ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When אֶחְקֹ֣ר <S%H2713><s%> when I have sounded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father כָּעֵ֤ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> any time מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> about to morrow הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <S%H7992><s%> [or] the third וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> toward David וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָז֙ <S%H227><s%> then אֶשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and I then send אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> toward וְגָלִ֖יתִי <S%H1540><s%> and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H241><s%> hearing

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> do יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לִֽיהוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3083><s%> to Jonathan וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> so יֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> and much more כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יֵיטִ֨ב <S%H3190><s%> but if it please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָבִ֤י <S%H1><s%> my father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> [to do] thee evil עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְגָלִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1540><s%> make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנֶ֔ךָ <S%H241><s%> to you וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H7971><s%> it thee and send thee away וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <S%H1980><s%> that thou mayest go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace וִיהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> has been יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> be with thee as he hath been with my father

וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not אִם־ <S%H518><s%> And thou shalt not only while yet עוֹדֶ֣נִּי <S%H5750><s%> I am still חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> I live וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> shew עִמָּדִ֛י <S%H5978><s%> me חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> me the kindness יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that I die

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַכְרִ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> But [also] thou shalt not cut off אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> חַסְדְּךָ֛ <S%H2617><s%> thy kindness מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> from בֵּיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> from my house עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not בְּהַכְרִ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> hath cut off יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> no not when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבֵ֣י <S%H341><s%> the enemies דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth

וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> So Jonathan עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> A with בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [a covenant] with the house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וּבִקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> even require יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [saying] Let the LORD מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> [it] at the hand אֹיְבֵ֥י <S%H341><s%> enemies דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David's

וַיּ֤וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> again יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan לְהַשְׁבִּ֣יעַ <S%H7650><s%> to swear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> caused David בְּאַהֲבָת֖וֹ <S%H160><s%> because he loved אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אַהֲבַ֥ת <S%H160><s%> him as he loved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul אֲהֵבֽוֹ׃ <S%H157><s%> him for he loved ס

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> Then Jonathan מָחָ֣ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow חֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [is] the new moon וְנִפְקַ֕דְתָּ <S%H6485><s%> and thou shalt be missed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because יִפָּקֵ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> will be empty מוֹשָׁבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4186><s%> because thy seat

וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H8027><s%> And [when] thou hast stayed three days תֵּרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> [then] thou shalt go down מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> quickly וּבָאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you נִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H5641><s%> where thou didst hide שָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thyself when הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H4639><s%> the business וְיָ֣שַׁבְתָּ֔ <S%H3427><s%> was [in hand] and shalt remain אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הָאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stone הָאָֽזֶל׃ <S%H237><s%> Ezel

וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three הַחִצִּ֖ים <S%H2678><s%> arrow צִדָּ֣ה <S%H6654><s%> on the side אוֹרֶ֑ה <S%H3384><s%> And I will shoot לְשַֽׁלַּֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> [thereof] as though I shot לִ֖י לְמַטָּרָֽה׃ <S%H4307><s%> at a mark
